sentence.p: PSA 121:1 שִׁ֗יר לַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹתאֶשָּׂ֣א עֵ֭ינַי אֶל־הֶהָרִ֑ים מֵ֝אַ֗יִן יָבֹ֥א עֶזְרִֽי׃
PSA 121:2 עֶ֭זְרִי מֵעִ֣ם יְהוָ֑ה עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה שָׁמַ֥יִם וָאָֽרֶץ׃
PSA 121:3 אַל־יִתֵּ֣ן לַמּ֣וֹט רַגְלֶ֑ךָ אַל־יָ֝נ֗וּם שֹֽׁמְרֶֽךָ׃

w.SDBH: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep

sentence.p: PSA 121:4 הִנֵּ֣ה לֹֽא־יָ֭נוּם וְלֹ֣א יִישָׁ֑ן שׁ֝וֹמֵ֗ר יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃

w.SDBH: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep

sentence.p: PSA 121:5 יְהוָ֥ה שֹׁמְרֶ֑ךָ יְהוָ֥ה צִ֝לְּךָ֗ עַל־יַ֥ד יְמִינֶֽךָ׃

w.SDBH: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep

sentence.p: PSA 121:6 יוֹמָ֗ם הַשֶּׁ֥מֶשׁ לֹֽא־יַכֶּ֗כָּה וְיָרֵ֥חַ בַּלָּֽיְלָה׃
PSA 121:7 יְֽהוָ֗ה יִשְׁמָרְךָ֥ מִכָּל־רָ֑ע יִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר אֶת־נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃

w.SDBH: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep
שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep

sentence.p: PSA 121:8 יְֽהוָ֗ה יִשְׁמָר־צֵאתְךָ֥ וּבוֹאֶ֑ךָ מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה וְעַד־עוֹלָֽם׃

w.SDBH: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep
יצא:002002001009:Move:to go out;to come out;to go away;to leave;to depart
